params.name: text
params.description: The Markdown text to render in HTML. Markdown content must be 400 KB or less.

params.name: mode
params.description:
The rendering mode. Can be either:  
\* `markdown` to render a document in plain Markdown, just like README.md files are rendered.  
\* `gfm` to render a document in [GitHub Flavored Markdown](https://github.github.com/gfm/), which creates links for user mentions as well as references to SHA-1 hashes, issues, and pull requests.

params.name: context
params.description: The repository context to use when creating references in `gfm` mode. Omit this parameter when using `markdown` mode.

name: Render a Markdown document in raw mode
description: You must send Markdown as plain text (using a `Content-Type` header of `text/plain` or `text/x-markdown`) to this endpoint, rather than using JSON format. In raw mode, [GitHub Flavored Markdown](https://github.github.com/gfm/) is not supported and Markdown will be rendered in plain format like a README.md file. Markdown content must be 400 KB or less.
